lines.gurmukhi: jYsy ibnu locn iblokIAY n rUp rMig; sRvn ibhUMn rwg nwd n sunIjIAY [

Unknown.translation: Just as without eyes a face cannot be seen and without ears, no musical note can be heard.

Sant Sampuran Singh.translation: ijs qrHwˆ locn nyqRwˆ qoˆ ibnwˆ rUp rMgsUrq Skl nhIˆ dyKI jw skdI qy sRRvn kMnwˆ ibnwˆ rwg nwd Sbd sMgIq dI DunI nhIˆ suxI jw skdI[

lines.gurmukhi: jYsy ibnu ijhbw n aucrY bcn Ar; nwskw ibhUMn bws bwsnw n lIjIAY [

Unknown.translation: Just as without tongue, no word can be spoken and without nose no fragrance can be smelled.

Sant Sampuran Singh.translation: ijs qrHwˆ locn nyqRwˆ qoˆ ibnwˆ rUp rMg sUrq Skl nhIˆ dyKI jw skdI qy sRRvn kMnwˆ ibnwˆ rwg nwd Sbd sMgIq dI DunI nhIˆ suxI jw skdI[

lines.gurmukhi: jYsy ibnu kr kir skY n ikrq kRm; crn ibhUMn Baun gaun kq kIjIAY [

Unknown.translation: Just as without hands no accomplishable work can be done and without feet no place can be reached.

Sant Sampuran Singh.translation: ijs qrHwˆ h`Qwˆ ibnwˆ ikrq kmweI krn jog kMm nhIˆ kr skIdw Aqy pYrwˆ ibnwˆ Gr nUM Blw iks qrHwˆ jwXw jw sky[

lines.gurmukhi: Asn bsn ibnu DIrju n DrY dyh; ibnu gur sbd n pRym rsu pIjIAY [533[

Unknown.translation: Just as without food and clothes a body cannot be kept healthy; similarly without the teachings and divine words obtainable from the True Guru, the wondrous elixir of Lord's love cannot be relished.  (533)

Sant Sampuran Singh.translation: Bojn bsqR ibnwˆ dyh Drvws nhIˆ Dwr skdI kYm nhIˆ rih skdI iesy pRkwr gurUSbd dI pRwpqI bwJoˆ rs AnuBv dw svwd iks qrHwˆ pIxw pRwpq hovy ]533]
